DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomise controlled trial : 3 IUI cycle versus 1 IVF/ICSI cycle woman age 38-42 year .
DOC.brief_title: IUI vs. IVF/ICSI Women Aged 38-42 Years : Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial .
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Prospective randomise controlled trial : 3 IUI cycle versus 1 IVF/ICSI cycle woman age 38-42 year . . Group 1 : 3 consecutive gonadotrophin stimulate IUI cycle ( Follitropine Bèta , Puregon , MSD ) . vs. Group 2 : 1 IVF/ ICSI cycle - Recombinant FSH ( Follitropine Bèta , Puregon , MSD ) - Antagonist protocol .
DOC.criteria: Women age 38 42 year . Sperm : use donor sperm husband sperm reach WHO criteria 2010 . Tubal infertility ( even one tube ) . Major uterine ovarian abnormality Metabolic abnormality
